content:
In Asturias, Spain, May is typically a pleasant month with mild temperatures and plenty of sunshine. However, the weather can vary depending on the specific location within Asturias.

In general, the average high temperature in May is around 18°C (64°F), while the average low temperature is around 11°C (52°F). It's not unusual for temperatures to rise to the mid-20s Celsius (mid-70s Fahrenheit) on sunny days.

May is also known for being a relatively dry month in Asturias, with an average of 12 rainy days throughout the month. However, it's always a good idea to pack for unpredictable weather and bring layers for cooler mornings and evenings.
